name: Large Scoopie Wax Tart Melt
description:
Don't these look good enough to eat? Well, I wouldn't advise it because these are tarts! Scoopies are available in any of my scents, and will be individually packaged in cello wrap with a tie.  I don't use a 'mold' for my scoopies, and each one is hand made and shaped. Because they're all unique, the average weight is approximately 2.3 - 2.8 ounces (generally on the larger side). Too large for your warmer? You can slice your scoopie with a warmed knife to the size you need, or simply break off the crumbles! These are totally customized, just for you.  

Please note that scoopie colors will vary. On occasion, I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to my tarts. If you would like me to leave out these decorations, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my tarts dye free! Please let me know if you would like me to leave your tarts in their natural, undyed, color. :o)

Please include your scent choice(s) in the "notes to seller" section when you make your payment. You can find my full scent list by clicking "Scent List" at the top of the page. ♥

Shipping on my website is set up as a basic rate. If there is an overage paid when you order, I will refund that cost when I print your shipping label. I only charge *exact* shipping costs for each order. Shipping rates on my website are US costs only. If you live outside of the US and would like to order, please contact me so that I may get a shipping quote for you. I ship WORLDWIDE. ♥

options.name: Colored and Decorated is fine with me!
No Sprinkles or Glitter, please.
Please leave my wax in it's natural un-dyed color.

name: Frog & Turtle Tarts
description:
Oh, these are the cutest things!! These tarts are actually frog and turtle shaped, and they're just so neat. I am really excited about these super cute new creatures! ♥ Frogs & Turtles weigh 1.1-1.2 ounces each, making them a perfect size for warmers. You may choose a frog or a turtle in the option box below, or choose to let me pick if you prefer. :o)

Please note that frog & turtle colors will vary. On occasion, I like to add glitter to my tarts. If you would like me to leave out the glitter, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my tarts dye free! Please let me know if you would like me to leave your tarts in their natural, undyed, color. :o)

Please include your scent choice(s) in the "notes to seller" section when you make your payment. You can find my full scent list by clicking "Scent List" at the top of the page. ♥

Shipping on my website is set up as a basic rate. If there is an overage paid when you order, I will refund that cost when I print your shipping label. I only charge *exact* shipping costs for each order. Shipping rates on my website are US costs only. If you live outside of the US and would like to order, please contact me so that I may get a shipping quote for you. I ship WORLDWIDE. ♥

name: Pumpkin Tarts
description:
Okay, who doesn't love a pumpkin? How about a mini pumpkin made from wax? Yes, please! These pumpkins are the cutest things, and are actually shaped like a real pumpkin - just a smaller version of course. Pumpkins weigh 1.1-1.2 ounces each, making them the perfect size for almost any warmer! ♥

Please note that pumpkin colors will vary. On occasion, I like to add glitter to my tarts. If you would like me to leave out the glitter, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my tarts dye free! Please let me know if you would like me to leave your tarts in their natural, undyed, color. :o)

Please include your scent choice(s) in the "notes to seller" section when you make your payment. You can find my full scent list by clicking "Scent List" at the top of the page. ♥

I only charge *exact* shipping costs for each order. Shipping rates on my website are US costs only. If you live outside of the US and would like to order, please contact me so that I may get a shipping quote for you. I ship WORLDWIDE. ♥

No Glitter on the pumpkin, please.
Please leave my pumpkin in its natural, un-dyed, color.

name: Cupcake Shaped Wax Tart Melt
description:
These cupcakes are poured in two separate pieces, which means I can pour it all in one scent or I can use two different ones! Keep in mind that they will be wrapped together, so if you choose two scents you will want to make sure they mesh well. :o)  These cupcakes would make a perfect Birthday gift for your wax loving friends and family. Of course, you can order cupcakes for yourself too. They're so cute, how could you resist? Cupcakes weigh about 1.8 ounces, and will arrive in cello wrap with a tie. You can melt the bottom, the top, or the entire thing if you prefer! The possibilities are endless! 

Please note that cupcake colors will vary. On occasion, I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to my tarts. If you would like me to leave out these decorations, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my tarts dye free! Please let me know if you would like me to leave your tarts in their natural, undyed, color. :o)

Please include your scent choice(s) in the "notes to seller" section when you make your payment. You can find my full scent list by clicking "Scent List" at the top of the page. ♥

I only charge *exact* shipping costs for each order. Shipping rates on my website are US costs only. If you live outside of the US and would like to order, please contact me so that I may get a shipping quote for you. I ship WORLDWIDE. ♥

options.name: Colored and Decorated is fine with me!
No Sprinkles or Glitter, please.
Please leave my wax in its natural, un-dyed, color.

name: *NEW* Chunky Tarts
description:
A chunk tart is basically a 'chunk' of wax containing different scents. Chunk tarts are made in batches of 9 tarts, and with scents that blend well together! For this reason, chunk tarts are ready-to-ship only, unless you want to order a full batch. :o) 

Chunk Tarts currently available:  

- Make my own Blend *ON SALE*: 
Do you have a few favorite scents you like to mix? Or maybe something sounds *really* good to you, and I haven't made it yet! You may now make your own blend! This option includes a full batch of chunky tarts (usually 9 1.5-3.5 ounce sized pieces). A full batch can vary in weight a bit, but is typically around 1.5 pounds. You must choose at least 3 scents, but may choose 4 if you'd prefer! Normally a $21.00 value, this option is on sale for $15.00 for this weekend only! ♥

Please choose which scent you would like in the option box below. Also, please note there are different sizes available. This is because each chunk is hand cut, and this produces different weights. :o) 

Shipping on my website is set up as a basic rate. If there is an overage paid when you order, I will refund that cost when I print your shipping label. I only charge *exact* shipping costs for each order. Shipping rates on my website are US costs only. If you live outside of the US and would like to order, please contact me so that I may get a shipping quote for you. I ship WORLDWIDE. ♥

options.name: Make My Own - Glitter & Sprinkles are fine with me!
Make My Own - No Glitter or Sprinkles, please.

name: Large Heart Tarts
description:
These hearts are so beautiful! They weigh in at around 1 ounce each, making them the perfect size for almost all warmers. Heart tarts make a perfect gift for those you love, or even a gift for yourself. They're a great size to try out scents that are new to you, or to order a variety of things for you to try! 

Please note that heart colors will vary. On occasion, I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to my tarts. If you would like me to leave out these decorations, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my tarts dye free! Please let me know if you would like me to leave your tarts in their natural, undyed, color. :o)

name: *SALE* Image Candles - Already made and ready to go! Click to see available candles. :o)
description:
These image candles are from orders that were placed, but not paid for. Their normal prices are $8.00 each, plus shipping, however I have discounted these candles since they're already made and ready to go! I'm just trying to clear them out. :o) 

Candle 1 - "PINK Spread the hope, find the cure..." - This candle is absolutely beautiful, and one of my best selling candles! This particular candle also has a 3D flower, and (2) 3D jewels for added decor. :o) 

Candle 2 - "Breast Cancer Awareness" - This candle is another best seller! Features a pink breast cancer ribbon. It also has (2) 3D flowers for added decor. :o) 

Candle 3 - "Faith" - This candle has been hand stamped and custom designed. Hand stamped candles are one of a kind, and feature beautiful details. The candle features pink & purple ink colors, and the designs wraps around the sides of the candle as well. Also has (2) 3D flowers for added decor. :o) 

Each candle is on SALE for $6.00 plus s&h. My website charges a flat shipping cost. If your shipping label is less than you pay, I will refund it immediately after printing your label. I would be happy to ship them outside of the US if needed, please contact me for a quote. ♥

options.name: PINK Spread the hope, find the cure...

name: Oval Mini Dessert Loaf
description:
Aren't these little loaves cute? Don't let the mini word fool you, these are good sized tarts! This listing is for my oval loaves. They weigh 2 or more ounces, generally on the larger side because of the topping. Too big for your warmer? That's okay! Just slice off what you need. In addition, I have a larger 3 ounce rectangle loaf as well. Each loaf is hand poured, and no two loaves will be the same! Loaves will arrive individually packaged in cello wrap, with a tie.

Please note that loaf colors will vary. On occasion, I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to my tarts. If you would like me to leave out these decorations, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my tarts dye free! Each flower weighs about 0.7-0.9 ounces each, and they are sold 2 per pack. Yes, you pay one price and get two flowers! ♥

name: Large Sized Image Candle Color or Black & White
description:
Have you ever had a photo that you just didn't want to frame? Perhaps a loved one has passed, and you want a more unique item to remember them... Or maybe you would like to remember the day you were married... Or how about your pet? The possibilities are absolutely endless with my image candles! 

This listing is for the "Large" sized image candles. They are about 6 inches tall and they can be designed with just a front image, and sometimes I can add a back image as well (depending on the shape of the images). The candles are white, and will be unscented. I can add quotes, photos, awareness ribbons, and more! Candle images can be designed in color, or black & white. 

After you order your candle(s), I will send you an email to collect the information, text, photos, etc. Before I create your candle, I will send you a couple of "proof" images to be sure that you like the design. I can also add 3D flowers and/or jewels at no extra charge. Please inquire if you are interested in these items, for color choices and information. 

When you order, please be sure to choose color or b&w in the options below. 

If you have any questions at all, please do not hesistate to contact me! I have created many of these image candles. I invite you to visit my Facebook page, and check out some of my work. :o)   

Shipping on my website is set up as a basic rate. If there is an overage paid when you order, I will refund that cost when I print your shipping label. I only charge *exact* shipping costs for each order. Shipping rates on my website are US costs only. If you live outside of the US and would like to order, please contact me so that I may get a shipping quote for you. I ship WORLDWIDE. ♥

options.name: Large Candle with black & white image
Large Candle with color image

name: Rainbow Creatures
description:
Like your tarts with a little more 'groove'? Then my Groovy Creatures are just for you! These 1.1 ounce tarts are poured in multiple stages, and with a little magic, a rainbow tart is born. Groovy Creatures usually feature 3 scents, layered on one another. This creates an amazing blend while you melt them (if you can gather the courage to melt them!). A customer recently recommended them to be used as a scented paper weight only, because they're just too cute to melt. ♥

Groovy Creatures are very time consuming to create, so I am currently stocking them as 'Ready to Ship' items only. If you wish to purchase your own scent combinations, please contact me and I'll see what I can do for you. :o) 

Groovy Creatures currently available...

Super Pumpkin:
Love Pumpkin? You'll love this!! These tarts are layed in Pumpkin Patch, Pumpkin Creme Brulee, and Pumpkin & Vanilla... TWICE! These have so much pumpkin yumminess, I almost decided not to list them. Yum! ♥

*Please note that color shades may vary a bit, but will always be rainbow colored as shown in the photos. ♥
---

description:
These loaves are extra big, and perfect for those of you who have found a scent you love! In addition, these loves make beautiful additions to any decor in your home. A grubby loaf has  a loaf base, and then a whipped topping added on top. Grubby loaves weigh between 1 and 1.5 pounds, and will arrive in a foil pan wrapped in cello with a tie. :o)

Please note that loaf colors will vary. I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to my loaves for added decor. If you would like me to leave out these decorations, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my loaves dye free! Please let me know if you would like me to leave your loaf in its natural, undyed, color. :o)

name: Sampler Package!
description:
A sampler is a mix of random scents and shapes. Samplers are great for those who would like to try a variety of scents, or those who love a variety of scents and are looking for a great deal! Samplers are created while I work. I sometimes make too much wax for an order, so the extras are grouped into random sampler packages. Samplers are totally random, and always different! Please know that they may include glitter and/or sprinkles. Each tart is packaged and labeled with the scent name.

This particular sampler (partially pictured) includes CUPCAKES only! There are 12 Cupcakes in the large sampler and 8 Cupcakes in the small. If you decided to purchase both, please know there will be some duplicates. :) The prices include US shipping! If you purchase both, I will refund any extra shipping funds when I print your label. :o) 

Samplers are shipped in the US via USPS Flat Rate bubble mailers ($5.70) OR Regional Rate boxes (my choice) and shipping is included in the price! :)  

If you are international and would like to purchase this sampler, please contact me immediately. Samplers usually sell very quickly, and they go to the first person who purchases it. :) 

*NO discounts will apply as samplers are already very discounted. If you use a discount code with your order, I will refund the order and request that you repurchase without using a discount code*

name: Scent Shot - 2 ounce
description:
Not a fan of all those fancy smancy shapes? Or do you prefer to have a cup to pour your wax back into? Then Scent Shots are perfect for you! These are the 2 ounce sized cups, and I fill them to the tippy top. A big plus about Scent Shots? They make storing your tarts a breeze! :o) 

Please note that tart colors will vary. On occasion, I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to my tarts. If you would like me to leave out these decorations, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my tarts dye free! name: Dessert Candle
description:
Sea Breeze Scents & Things custom poured candles! These candles are in a beautiful glass jar. Each candle weighs in at approximately 12 ounces without the jar, and well over a pound with the jar! They have a beautiful dessert like topping. Each candle will feature a beautiful customized label, featuring some of my own sunset photography. Candles will come beautifully packaged in cello wrap, with a ribbon tie, and they are double bubble wrapped for shipping.

Candles may be made wickless for a $0.50 savings! Wickless candles can be used on candle warmers, which melt the candle instead of using a flame. If you would like your candle to be made without a wick, please select that option below.

Please note that candle colors may vary. On occasion, I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to the topping of my candles. If you would like me to leave out these decorations, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my candles dye free! Please let me know if you would like me to leave your candle(s) in their natural, undyed, color. :o)

name: Scented Wax Brittle
description:
Ever wish you had a little more, or a little less wax? Well then Scent Brittle is the way to go! My brittle is made thin, and comes in lots of smaller pieces. Of course, it's easy to snap and you can choose exactly how much, or how little, you would like! Scent Brittle is available in 5-6 ounce bags. The weight may vary a bit, but it will always be at least 5 ounces. Brittle is unique in that no two pieces will ever be the same! 

Please note that brittle colors will vary. Brittle may be solid color, or tye dyed. On occasion, I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to my tarts. If you would like me to leave out these decorations, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my tarts dye free! description:

Please note that bar colors will vary. On occasion, I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to my tarts. name: Sliceable Chunk Loaf
description:
These loaves are extra big, and perfect for those of you who have found a scent you love! In addition, these loves make beautiful additions to any decor in your home. A chunk loaf consists of tarts that are sliced into chunks, and then a filling over top of the chunks. Chunk loaves may have up to 4 scents (3 scents for chunks, and one scent for the filling). Please remember that these scents will blend together while melting, so be sure to choose something you know you'll love. Chunk loaves weigh about 1 pound, or 16 ounces, and will arrive in a foil pan wrapped in cello with a tie. :o)

Please note that chunk and loaf colors will vary. I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to my loaves for added decor. If you would like me to leave out these decorations, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my loaves dye free! I can, often times, add a name or date(s) to the candle as well, if you would like. The candles are white, and will be unscented. I can add quotes, photos, awareness ribbons, and more! Candle images can be designed in color, or black & white.

After you order your candle(s), I will send you an email to collect the information, text, photos, etc. Before I create your candle, I will send you a couple of "proof" images to be sure that you like the design. I can also add 3D flowers and/or jewels at no extra charge. Please inquire if you are interested in these items, for color choices and information.

When you order, please be sure to choose color or b&w in the options below.

If you have any questions at all, please do not hesistate to contact me! I have created many of these image candles. I invite you to visit my Facebook page, and check out some of my work. :o)

Shipping on my website is set up as a basic rate. If there is an overage paid when you order, I will refund that cost when I print your shipping label. I only charge *exact* shipping costs for each order. Shipping rates on my website are US costs only. If you live outside of the US and would like to order, please contact me so that I may get a shipping quote for you. I ship WORLDWIDE. ♥

options.name: Small Candle with black & white image
Small Candle with color image

name: Rectangle Mini Dessert Loaf
description:
Aren't these little loaves cute? Don't let the mini word fool you, these are good sized tarts! This listing is for my rectangle loaves. They weigh 3 or more ounces, generally on the larger side because of the topping. Too big for your warmer? That's okay! Just slice off what you need. In addition, I have a smaller 2 ounce oval loaf as well. Each loaf is hand poured, and no two loaves will be the same! Loaves will arrive individually packaged in cello wrap, with a tie. 

Please note that loaf colors will vary. On occasion, I like to add glitter and/or sprinkles to my tarts. If you would like me to leave out these decorations, please select that option when you purchase. I can also make any of my tarts dye free! Please let me know if you would like me to leave your tarts in their natural, undyed, color. :o)

Please include your scent choice(s) in the "notes to seller" section when you make your payment. You can find my full scent list by clicking "Scent List" at the top of the page. ♥

Shipping on my website is set up as a basic rate. If there is an overage paid when you order, I will refund that cost when I print your shipping label. I only charge *exact* shipping costs for each order. Shipping rates on my website are US costs only. If you live outside of the US and would like to order, please contact me so that I may get a shipping quote for you. I ship WORLDWIDE. ♥

options.name: Colored and Decorated is fine with me!
No Sprinkles or Glitter, please.
Please leave my wax in its natural, un-dyed, color.

name: Stars, Holiday, & Love Tarts
description:
These tarts fall into my *Mini* category, meaning they're smaller than most. These are larger than my other mini tart listing, however they still weigh in around a half ounce each. They're the perfect size for sampling scents before you order something larger, blending scents, or for smaller tart warmers. These tarts are the perfect size for most plug in warmers as well! ♥ You may choose from the following options: 
Star Tarts
Holiday Trees & Snowmen
Love Tarts
Or feel free to mix and match! :o)

Please note that tart colors will vary. If you prefer, I can also make any of my tarts dye free! Please let me know if you would like me to leave your tarts in their natural, undyed, color. :o)

Please include your scent choice(s) in the "notes to seller" section when you make your payment. You can find my full scent list by clicking "Scent List" at the top of the page. ♥

Shipping on my website is set up as a basic rate. If there is an overage paid when you order, I will refund that cost when I print your shipping label. I only charge *exact* shipping costs for each order. Shipping rates on my website are US costs only. If you live outside of the US and would like to order, please contact me so that I may get a shipping quote for you. I ship WORLDWIDE. ♥
